snippet.title: Pedestrian goes through car windscreen
snippet.content: BREAKING: A pedestrian has been hit by a vehicle in Bowen. Emergency services are rushing to the scene. The pedestrian is believed to have gone through the windscreen of the car. The crash was reported about 9pm at the intersection of Poole Street and Leichhardt Street. The Queensland Police Service and Queensland Ambulance Service are en route to the crash site.
